name: Dark XDA
description:
Turns xda-developers.com dark. Although the user style is applied to all XDA pages (portal, forums, wiki) and suits them all, it's fully optimized for the forums. Customizable Colors version: http://userstyles.org/styles/96703/dark-xda-custom-colors Make sure you're using the "XDA 2013 Beta" forum theme (you can check/change your theme in the Forum's footer). Also compatible with "XDA 2013 Beta - 1024" with minor bugs (nav bar icons appearing when they shouldn't). Non firefox users: Some things aren't correctly applied for Chrome/Other browser. These include:
  • Some borders are much darker than what they should be.
This theme is mainly tested on Firefox. Minimal testing is done on Chrome, to ensure nothing breaks. Please check the XDA thread for more info and extra modifications/tweaks. XDA thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2054569
additional_info: 29-07-2014: Theme new [code] formatting, minor fixes for black/dark text for the forums and the portal. 06-05-2014: Themed community promoted apps box (in the sidebar) and some previously missed DevDB buttons. 24-03-2014: Updated Roboto fonts to v10. 09-03-2014: Various minor fixes to the forums and wiki. 08-02-2014: Fix for latest Stylish update for Firefox users. Minor fixes. 30-01-2014: Themed some missing pages most people don't access. 22-01-2014: Minor fixes. 13-01-2014: Minor fixes. 12-01-2014: Minor fixes. Input/select elements don't use images anymore. 03-01-2014: Minor changes. 10-12-2013: 'Find Device' dropdown themed again. 27-11-2013: Minor fixes. 11-10-2013: Many minor fixes (DevDB, Wiki and more). 08-09-2013: More DevDB fixes and improvements. 05-09-2013: Minor fixes to some DevDB pages. 14-08-2013: Donation page, Service Unavailable pages themed. Minor fixes. 11-07-2013: Many minor fixes. 10-07-2013: The large majority of forum icons has been themed. Many fixes to the wiki and forums (mostly related to the new DevDB additions). Other minor fixes and improvements. 06-07-2013: The Roboto font will be now used for the theme. Check the XDA thread if you want to disable this. More icons replaced. Minor fixes. 05-07-2013: Buttons and inputs should now all be themed (new style). New XDA feature (DevDB) related fixes. Modified username colors to better suit the dark theme and improve visibility. Some more replaced icons. Added transitions to tab like elements. 04-07-2013: Input buttons are themed differently now. The rest of the buttons will follow, taking distracting blue borders out where they're not necessary and generally following the Holo guidelines for buttons. More minor fixes, additions, and icon replacements. 03-07-2013: Squared corners are applied correctly to the correct elements. Also use 2px for squared corners' radius, so that they're still smooth. Minor fixes. 02-07-2013: Squared corners are now used for a more Holofied appearance. Visit the XDA thread for information on how to disable this. Fixes and improvements. 28-06-2013: More icons/input elements have been themed. Many other minor improvements. 22-06-2013: Some Wiki fixes. Minor forum fix. 20-06-2013: The project bar (appears for some ROM threads) and its different tabs are now themed. Other minor changes. 15-06-2013: Fixes and improvements. Most notably: the signature line separator is now lighter, themed the advanced posting/editing box menus, themed some buttons that were forgotten. Chrome users: white "Most Thanked" background (in the sidebar) should be fixed. 04-06-2013: I forgot to theme radio buttons in the last two releases. Done. Chrome users, please read the note I added in the style's description above. 03-06-2013: Another attempt at fixing check boxes for Chrome users. 01-06-2013: Check boxes should now be themed correctly for both Firefox and Chrome users. 31-05-2013: Disqus elements can be themed. Edit the userstyle and uncomment the last part to do so. Various fixes and improvements. 19-04-2013: Various fixes. 16-04-2013: Various fixes. 12-04-2013: Minor tweaks. More icons are now replaced, such as the sticky icons and the thanks bars. 11-04-2013 (Update2): Minor fix. 11-04-2013: Various tweaks. Fixed missing areas. Started replacing images. All important images are now replaced, with more to come. 10-04-2013: Body background changed to a slightly darker black. More buttons are now colored. Buttons should look better now. Borders now have a dark color and shouldn't be flashy anymore or restrict user view. Other minor changes. 09-04-2013: Portal/Wiki are now themed as well. Other minor tweaks. 04-04-2013: Complete overhaul: Lighter colors are now used instead of pure black. Should be much more pleasant. The layout/color changes in general are now closer to the original site, but dark.

discussions.name: Disregard bad reviews - they don't know how to use this
Almost 2019, and still works as expected
